message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 6000 for me and 4000 for you.
You're starting high, I'm starting low
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted my offer. I propose we split it 5250 for me and 4750 for you.
Getting closer, but I want more
I've made another adjustment. My proposal now is 4912.50 for me and 5087.50 for you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
